summary: Added Skyforge armor to match the original skyforge weapons in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
--UPDATE--
I\'m sorry if anyone decided to attack the hidden NPC within Jorrvaskr that I forgot about. It\'s been removed and the file with him is in optional if anyone needs a practice dummy xD.
WARNING he\'s at lvl 81 and unkillable.

This mod adds Steel armors to skyrim, that can be forged at the skyforge only once you\'ve completed the companions questline. These are also sold by Eorlund Graymane, for those who wish can just buy and do whatever from there as well.

Comparing the boost skyforge weapons give you compared to the regular steel weapons I worked a Skyforge Steel Armor variant that\'ll give those steel loving skyrim players stronger armor to go along with those Skyforge weapons.


I have plans for re modeling and new textures but for now they are regular steel models.
And they are compatible with any mod that changes the steel textures.

Here\'s the mod for the textures shown in the images, aMidianBorn Book of Silence, excellent compilation mod.

Hope to get feedback and that you all enjoy this mod.
author: FourthRulerEntity

files.name: Skyforge Armor Sets - less invincible NPCs
files.fileName: Skyforge Armor Sets - less invincible NPCs-30298-1-1.rar
